title: Northern Arc Capital raises $75 million debt from Dutch lender FMO
description: The funds raised will be deployed in retail micro-loans, MSME loans, and green loans, the statement said, adding that this will also help in the wish to fostering inclusive economic growth and environmental sustainability.
